messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

You want to organize a fundraiser with 16 socialites. Paul is connected to Bob, Nick, Sherry, and John. Bob is connected to  Paul, Nick, Sherry, and Rose. Nick is connected to  Paul, Bob, Sherry and Amanda. Sherry is also connected to Paul, Bob, Nick, and William. Amanda is connected to  Peter, John, Daisy, and Nick. Peter is connected to Amanda, John, Daisy, and Adam. John is connected to Paul, Daisy, Peter, and Amanda. Daisy is also connected to Amanda, Peter, John, and Maggie. Alisa is connected to Maggie, Jennifer, Adam, and Russell. Maggie is connected to Alisha, Jennifer, Daisy, and Adam. Jennifer is connected to Andrew, Alisha, Adam, and Maggie. Adam is also connected to Alisha, Maggie, Jennifer, and Peter. Andrew is connected to William, Russell, Rose, and Jennifer. William is connected to Sherry, Andrew, Russell, Rose. Russell is connected to Andrew, William, Rose, and Alsiha. Rose is also connected to Andrew, William, Russell, and Bob. Now you are told that Rose can donate $250K while Maggie can donate $500K. Also, if you want to get connected with Amanda, you need to pay $10K to her company. From Paul, what is the path to the person who can donate the most money? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

You will make a step-by-step action list, that shows that you are thinking. Then, for each step, provide the regular expression output.
Step 1 jsut print [Name,[Organized by]>>>([Money]) [Money]) === means that the person can donate
Step 2 print <- russell //means there is no one who organized Russell
Step 3 print <$10K ($250)*Xk
After we get the main thread return, print [dear] $((250))k (Rose)

So I wrote and wrote and have been struggling with just how to complete this challenge. I understand where to put the regular expression, however, not sure if i am coming at it the best way and can be clear in how to describe what I am doing. Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.

I have been working on this challenge for about 15 minutes. I think I have got the gist of what to do, but i am unsure of how to actually do it.

I have been working on this challenge for about 20 minutes. I think I have the gist of what to do, but i am unsure of how to actually do it.

Hello Matt,
I've enjoyed

expected_answer: Answer: Paul, Bob, Rose, Russell, Alisha, Maggie
Answer: Paul, Bob, Rose, Andrew, Jennifer, Maggie
